headline: Invesco Dividend Income Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund is balanced across sectors and industries, with a focus on long-term growth areas and companies with sustainable free cash flow and healthy balance sheets.

headline: Invesco EQV International Equity Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Class A shares underperformed the MSCI ACWI ex USA Index. During the quarter, we initiated four new positions and exited one stock based on our EQV fundamentals.

headline: Astera Labs Q4: Strong Finish, Stronger Outlook, Excessive Dilution
summary: Astera Labs reported a strong Q4, beating revenue expectations by 10% and tripling its earnings per share. Find out why I maintain a hold rating on ALAB stock.
